original: intros u v H. unfold orthogonal. apply rotation with (u' := u) (v' := v). apply oppu_oppv. apply rotation with (u' := opp u) (v' := v). apply rotation with (u' := opp u) (v' := opp v). apply R_permute. apply rotation with (u' := opp u) (v' := u). apply rotation with (u' := opp u) (v' := v). apply oppu_oppv. apply oppu_v. apply rotation with (u := opp u) (v := opp v). apply oppu_oppv. apply orthogonal_opp. unfold orthogonal in H. apply double_orthogonal. apply orthogonal_opp. apply orthogonal_sym. apply orthogonal_opp. auto. apply orthogonal_opp. apply orthogonal_sym. apply orthogonal_opp. auto.
